analysis.description:
DadiSale.closeSale (/unique_chucks/14/0xebaa1766c577a1ea5833f0502bd9984aef22c61f.sol#423-437) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(recipient,remaining) (/unique_chucks/14/0xebaa1766c577a1ea5833f0502bd9984aef22c61f.sol#436-437)

DadiSale.distributeTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0xebaa1766c577a1ea5833f0502bd9984aef22c61f.sol#453-463) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_address,tokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xebaa1766c577a1ea5833f0502bd9984aef22c61f.sol#461)

DadiSale.distributeToAlternateAddress (/unique_chucks/14/0xebaa1766c577a1ea5833f0502bd9984aef22c61f.sol#474-487) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_tokenAddress,tokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xebaa1766c577a1ea5833f0502bd9984aef22c61f.sol#485)

DadiSale.redistributeTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0xebaa1766c577a1ea5833f0502bd9984aef22c61f.sol#498-510) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(recipient,tokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xebaa1766c577a1ea5833f0502bd9984aef22c61f.sol#508-509)

DadiSale.tokenPrice should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0xebaa1766c577a1ea5833f0502bd9984aef22c61f.sol#243)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0xebaa1766c577a1ea5833f0502bd9984aef22c61f.sol#82-83)
